author: Eline Bijkerk
comment: Wanted to try out this app, but it lacks some features. I would love to see a list of items that were just bought. It's very easy to accidentally tap an item and it's really hard to tell which item just vanished. Really missing the Dutch language as well as not all of my family members know English very well.  While I love the idea of adding photos to products, I'd really like to be able to see those pictures in the list without having to long press the item. I'd also love an easier way to add a different quantity straight from the list.

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi Eline. Thank you for your feedback. You can see the last 12 items that were deleted in "recently used". We're also working on adding more languages. It's best to follow us on Facebook to stay tuned on the progress there! Your Bring! Team

author: Guillaume Bero
comment: Could you enable word auto completion? It's very annoying to it's deactivated on the input edit text

author: D.
comment: And it works with the Amazon Echo now that's called progress good app I would recommend this app to anybody give it a try you'll see what I mean

author: Jeanell Williams
comment: Love this app! I can add items with Alexa and view my shopping list in my watch.

author: Blondae
comment: I love this app, is easy to use and helpful for my fam!

author: Jacob Huigsloot
comment: Perfect for what we use it for.

author: Nedim Hodzic
comment: Awesome

author: Aleth A. Gayosa
comment: Hello, Bring! Team. Your app has been really helpful. The item listing is comprehensive, and the interface is snappy, easy to view and understand. I am unsure if I missed this as an option or setting though, but I hope there could be some reminder or notification (to get groceries) with the option to set time and date. Thank you so much!

author: Zaid H. RASSAM
comment: Amazing App, makes life so easy for shopping and not forgetting things to buy or yo do and Specialy the share with other people is amazing. Thank you for the whole team who worked on it

author: Manuel Wingold
comment: This app does what it's supposed to in a very beautiful yet minimalistic manner. Simply great!

author: Neale Hanlon
comment: Great way to sync lists between different people and for different purposes.

author: Dennis Melhede
comment: They blocked that you can delete the app by holding down the icon :-(

author: Raghavendra Ponuganti
comment: So far brilliant. Very useful for shopping list maintenance and sharing. Integrating the list with Google Assistant would be a great add on feature.

author: Nesha Mulle
comment: Funktioniert einwandfrei und ist eine meiner meistverwendeten Apps.

author: Thomas Adam
comment: Super Einkaufslisten App. Auch sharebar mit mehreren.

author: Anne Pentney
comment: Love this. Easy to use. Like the lists of items and categories.

author: Aidan Ryan
comment: Excellent

author: Ivan Ivanov
comment: This is the best app for grocery shopping ever! I have used only 2 or 3 more but this one definitely worths it. I use it already 4months I think. It's the free version but it works perfectly and there are no annoying adds and think that may slow down my work

author: Magga Musin
comment: I love the app. It's ad free, simple and easy to use but it lacks some content. Could be more options to choose from and maybe have icon management/creation or just more icon selection available. I'll rate 5 when this will be improved somehow👍

author: Lynne Borrie-Belcher
comment: This app works perfectly. It is a shareable grocery list. The lists update in real time as you mark off items while shopping. It is just what my busy household needs.

author: Nick Davies
comment: Good app but you should be able to custom order the list by drag and dropping the icons.

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi Nick. Thank you for the feedback and the suggestion on how we can improve Bring! Your Bring! Team

author: David Back
comment: Like so many apps today, big on pretty but low on functionality. Its not a *list* its a bunch of kindergarten-primary-color-blocks of items. No columns, no aisles, no units needed, no pricing. Guess if I were 5 and needed to keep a "list" of my alphabet blocks it would be useful.

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi David. Thank you for your feedback. We're sorry that you did not like Bring! Your Bring! team

author: Adrian Board
comment: Easy to use, great sharing and multiple lists. Well integrated for smart watch use...my shopping list easily available on my wrist.

author: MrWh1t3x75
comment: Really good app to make sure no one forgets anything on the list! :) Thanks for this amazing app 😍

author: Moses Truong
comment: The best shopping list app with seamless sharing and it's free from ads! It would be even better if it has undo function in case accidentally removed an item

author: Sebastian Scherrer
comment: Super App. Brucht eifach en Modus: "Shopping Vorbereitung" und "Shopping". Süst verklicked mer sich zu schnell bim plane vom ihkauf

author: Lyricalheart Yvol
comment: Crashes when making custom "inspiration board" basicly a standard shopping list option

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi. Sorry for the problems. Can you write an email to feedback@getbring.com? We would like to have a closer look at the problem and help you as quickly as we can. Your Bring! Team

author: Summer Long
comment: Bring! lets me keep a running tab on needed groceries, as well as lists for events. Very easy to use!

author: Valerie Williams
comment: Love it! Been using it for two years, I wouldn't like to be  without it, brilliant thank you

author: Ana Kosta
comment: Very easy to use and has everithing i need.Very usefull

author: Ken Curry
comment: Great shopping list app.  Easy to use.

author: Alexander Pacha
comment: Awesome Shopping list app

author: mobile Gaming
comment: One of the best one

author: Jochem Steenhuis
comment: Almost perfect, still missing the Dutch version :-/    I like the integration with Google Home though.  Using it weekly.

author: Samir Dawne
comment: I like to use it as a reminder for my daily needs... Helps me organize my shopping. Also helps me stick to the shopping plans and helps avoiding spur-of-moment shopping.

author: Lukas Baumgartner
comment: Perfect app for coordinating grocery shopping with my girlfriend.

author: Ilya Shinkarenko
comment: 5 stars if you allow to rearrange the lists order in menu

author: Lenomo Machine
comment: You can't use your own list with your own products. Uninstalled.

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for your feedback and the suggestion on how we can improve Bring! Your Bring! team

author: LordFends
comment: Perfect for keeping track of groceries

author: Gabriel Parodi
comment: Thanks to the developers.  Simple and effective tool. With the exception of the big version changes, it remains difficult to notice what is new in the recent updates.

reply.author: Bring! Labs AG
reply.content: Hi Gabriel. Thank you for your feedback. These were probably mostly bug fixes. We try to publish our updates as bug free as possible but sometimes everything doesn't work out as planned. Sorry for that! Your Bring! team
